::Battera::

She looked at the gun pointed at her. She put her hands up.
"Please enhance our calm.  I will bring no trouble with me.  I am 
here to talk to the leader of this Maximal group.  That is all. 
Chordate allowed me entrance tot he ship and gave me a room to use 
for a little while."  She looked at the gun again. "I would 
appreciate it if you would put the gun down. Please?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex/Firearm::
> 
> Rex and Firearm look at the prisoners at the cell, then looking at 
Brix. 
> "Allright, see ya," Rex says as Brix walks off.
> 
> Rex looks at Firearm. "You'll be allright guarding them?"
> 
> Firearm nods, "I can handle."
> 
> Rex walks over to an intercom, activating it for the prisoners to 
hear, the 
> energy walls otherwise defeating all sound.
> 
> "Firearm is standing guard," he says into it, "He's triggerhappy, 
as I'm sure 
> you've noticed, so try not to piss him off. We'll be back for you 
guys later."
> 
> Rex turns and walks out of the room, heading for the bridge. He 
nearly runs 
> into Battera before he sees her, jumping back and aiming all his 
guns at her. 
> Her signature did not register as Maximal, and that was a bad sign.
> 
> "Who are you?" he says, his guns ready.
